20 
21 #pragma once
22 
23 #ifndef DEPTHSENSE_CORE_BLOSCCOMPRESSION
24 #define DEPTHSENSE_CORE_BLOSCCOMPRESSION
25 #include "blosc.h"
26 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1700) // 1700 = MSVC++ 11.0
27 #include <thread>
28 #else
29 #define NTHREADS 4
30 #endif
31 
32 namespace DepthSense
33 {
34 namespace Core
35 {
36  // Blosc library is used for fast compression of depth, phase and confidence
37  class BloscCompression
38  {
39  public:
40  static BloscCompression& get()
41  {
42  static BloscCompression bloscCompression;
43  return bloscCompression;
44  }
45 
46  template< class T >
47  std::vector<T> compress(const std::vector<T>& data_in)
48  {
49  static_assert(std::is_integral<T>::value, "Blosc compression: Integer required");
50  int data_size = static_cast<int>(data_in.size());
51  int isize = data_size * sizeof(T);
52  std::vector<T> data_out(data_size + BLOSC_MAX_OVERHEAD);
53  const T* pdata_in = data_in.data();
54  T* pdata_out = data_out.data();
55 
56  int csize = blosc_compress(6, (m_shuffle) ? 1 : 0, sizeof(T), isize, pdata_in, pdata_out, isize);
57  if (csize <= 0)
58  {
59  // Uncompressible just do a copy ()
60  csize = blosc_compress(0, (m_shuffle) ? 1 : 0, sizeof(T), isize, pdata_in, pdata_out, isize);
61  }
62  data_out.resize(csize);
63  return data_out;
64  }
65 
66  private:
67  BloscCompression()
68  : m_compression_ratio(6)
69  , m_shuffle(true)
70  {
71  blosc_init();
72 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1700)
73  int nthreads = std::thread::hardware_concurrency();
74 #else
75  int nthreads = NTHREADS;
76 #endif
77  // Blosc supports 6 threads max and 1 min
78  // You can find more data about blosc here: http://www.blosc.org/blosc-in-depth.html
79  nthreads = blosc_set_nthreads( (nthreads < 1) ? 4 : (nthreads > 6) ? 6 : nthreads);
80  }
81 
82  ~BloscCompression()
83  {
84  blosc_destroy();
85  }
86 
87  int16_t m_compression_ratio;
88  bool m_shuffle;
89  };
90 }
91 }
92 #endif // DEPTHSENSE_CORE_BLOSCCOMPRESSION
